summary: Tested LuxScaler v28 PROLUX UI and Archives Viewer features. All requested features are working correctly: PROLUX shows 27 sliders in compact grid with toggle between Compacto/Detallado modes, quick controls (1,5,10) work. Archives Viewer has functional zoom (wheel), pan (drag), and comparison slider with perfectly aligned before/after images.
critical_code_review_comments: ProfileConfigModal.tsx: PROLUX UI implementation is clean with proper state management for 27 sliders across 3 pillars
ArchivesDashboard.tsx: Good implementation of zoom/pan using transform and translate. Images are forced to same dimensions using displaySize state
The comparison slider uses clipPath for smooth before/after reveal effect
context_for_next_testing_agent: All PROLUX and Archives features are working. PROLUX: 27 sliders in 3 pillars (photoscaler, stylescaler, lightscaler), compact/detailed toggle, quick controls (1,5,10). Archives: zoom with wheel, pan with drag, comparison slider with aligned images. Login credentials work. Sessions exist in archive for testing.

PROLUX_UI.27_sliders_compact_grid: PASS - 9 sliders per pillar in 3x3 grid
PROLUX_UI.toggle_compacto_detallado: PASS - Both modes work, detailed shows descriptions
PROLUX_UI.quick_controls_1_5_10: PASS - Buttons update slider values correctly

Archives_Viewer.comparison_slider_alignment: PASS - Before/after images perfectly aligned using same displaySize
Archives_Viewer.zoom_with_wheel: PASS - Zoom changed from 12% to 16% with mouse wheel
Archives_Viewer.pan_with_drag: PASS - Image position shifts when dragging
